label: Mental health
article: Firefighting and mental health: experiences of repeated exposure to trauma
content: I’m a student at the Cronkite Journalism school at Arizona State. I’m writing a story for my intermediate reporting class on firefighters who suffer from PTSD and I’d like to gain more insight and statistics.
img_credit: Photo by Matt Chesin
img_alt: Firefighters wearing their full gear stand behind the flames of training blaze

label: Social change
article: Chilean housing policy: a pendant human rights perspective
content: I am working as an organiser on a housing campaign with Syrian refugees and homeless families in Belfast. This research would be really useful for our work in fighting for better rights.
img_credit: Photo by Nathan Dumlao
img_alt: A row of tents on a city street where homeless people camp.

label: Medical practice
article: Haploidentical donor transplants for severe aplastic anemia
content: I work in Buenos Aires, Argentina. We have a 27 year old patient from Colombia without siblings, so we are trying to perform a haplo transplant.
img_credit: Photo by National Cancer Institute
img_alt: Six vials of blood in test tubes alternating purple and orange tops.

label: Big deal cancellations
article: Combination of hyper-CVAD with ponatinib as first-line therapy for patients with Philadelphia chromosome-positive acute lymphoblastic leukaemia: long-term follow-up of a single-centre, phase 2 study
content: This article is important for management of patients but is no longer available to providers at University of California institutions due to discontinuation of the UC contract with Elsevier.
img_credit: Photo by National Cancer Institute
img_alt: A scanning electron microscope image shows dendritic cells, pseudo-colored in green, interacting with T cells, pseudo-colored in pink.

label: Environmental studies
article: The world at your feet: desert biological soil crusts
content: I am a high school senior in Tucson, Arizona. I have a growing interest in soil ecology, and can see myself either pursuing a career in environmental conservation. This article would help set me on the right path.
img_credit: Photo by Dylan de Jonge
img_alt: Ground level view of farmland shows the soil between two rows of sprouting plants.

label: Personal health
article: Glad Press’n Seal for the Treatment of Chronic Exposure Keratopathy
content: My husband has contracted Bell’s Palsy and I’ve been searching for a way to create a moisture chamber (without spending lots of money).
img_credit: Photo by Galen Crout
img_alt: In the dark sits a purple-lit sensory deprivation tank with a top lid open above it showing the water within.

label: Medical practice
article: An exploration of factors associated with post-traumatic stress in ER nurses
content: I would like to include the study for my paper which is about the effect of traumatic events on emergency department nurses. This paper is required in order to get my bachelor’s degree.
img_credit: Photo by Ehimetalor Akhere Unuabona
img_alt: A woman nurse wears a blue gown stained with red during a street protest.

label: Research
article: The effect of globalization on women’s rights in MENA region
content: I am writing a report on the effects of globalization for women in the workplace around the world and this article would benefit my research!
img_alt: Two women posing next to each other in an office. The black woman is wearing a dark suit and the white woman is wearing a grey suit.

label: Social change
article: Always running: candidate emergence among women of color over time
content: I’m a committee member of the Democratic political party for my town. This research looks like it would be persuasive in convincing leadership to put more specialized effort into recruitment.
img_credit: Photo by Glen Carrie
img_alt: A pile of board game letters spells out V-O-T-E.

label: Personal health
article: Comparison of the clinical and functional outcomes following 3- and 4-corner fusions
content: I have to chose between these 2 surgeries. I want to make an informed  decision as it is my body and I only get one
img_credit: Photo by Olga Guryanova
img_alt: Two men performing surgery wearing blue smocks

label: Social change
article: Resilience in higher education students: a scoping review
content: I am an intern for a non-profit organization working to improve community resilience in the aftermath of the fires in Northern California. I have been tasked with creating and offering programming to higher education institutions in our area and prefer to keep my material to high empirical standards
requester: Mark, student at Sonoma Community Resilience Collaborative, Santa Rosa Community Health
img_credit: Photo by JOHN TOWNER
img_alt: Aerial photograph of smoke-covered trees in Yosemite Valley, California

label: Education
article: Investigation of physiological and behavioral responses in dogs participating in animal-assisted therapy with children diagnosed with attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder
content: I’m making a paper for school. I choose to look if dogs have a positive influence on children with ADHD. I think that this article can be an answer to my question!
img_credit: Photo by Jamie Street
img_alt: Gold-coloured dog on moss-covered rock surrounded by flowers

label: Research
article: Using a system dynamics model to assess the effects of capital subsidies and feed-in tariffs on solar pv installations
content: I’m conducting research on the cost of customer acquisition in the US Residential Solar Industry for my Master’s thesis. This article would be important to understand the impacts of high customer acquisition costs on the marginal propensity to purchase solar, and then would enable me to calculate the carbon impact of high customer acquisition costs.
img_credit: Photo by Macau Photo Agency
img_alt: Aerial photograph of numerous solar panels

label: Medical practice
article: Trastuzumab deruxtecan (ds-8201a) in patients with advanced her2-positive breast cancer previously treated with trastuzumab emtansine: a dose-expansion, phase 1 study.
content: I do clinical research for individual patients with breast cancer. This research article is very important for this effort. I am deeply thankful for your dedication in making your important research available to all
img_credit: Photo by National Cancer Institute
img_alt: Microscopic photography of stress fibers and microtubules in human breast cancer cells

label: Education
article: Hand massage therapy for pain management after cardiac surgery: acceptability and feasibility in the intensive care unit
content: I am in a nursing research class learning how to present evidence based practice, quantitative studies.  This is the subject content my group chose to present.  This content will help me learn how to interpret research and determine validity of evidence
requester: Christina, student at California State University Long Beach
img_credit: Photo by Mikael Kristenson
img_alt: High-angle photograph of people sitting in classroom

label: Social change
article: The relationship of adverse childhood experiences to ptsd, depression, poly-drug use and suicide attempt in reservation-based native american adolescents and young adults
content: I am writing a paper on the cultural competencies for working with at risk youth in Native communities
requester: Jennifer, student at Arizona State University
img_credit: Photo by Tim Marshall

label: Education
article: Hijab, visibility and the performance of identity
content: I want to use your article for my research of Muslim women’s right and symbolic meanings of hijab in modern world. This is for my work in high school and it’s important to me to graduate with a good score
img_credit: Photo by Hasan Almasi
img_alt: Three women in pink floral hijabs surrounded by flowering tree

label: Education
article: Frequent riding sessions daily elevate stress, blood lactic acid, and heart rate of thoroughbred riding horses
content: I am a veterinary behaviorist at UC Davis and wish to be able to fully reference this article when teaching veterinary students
requester: Melissa, researcher at University of California-Davis
img_credit: Photo by Filipe Dos Santos Mendes
img_alt: Softly-lit brown & white horse in a stable
